snippet: The Supreme Court on Monday struggled to find a narrow way to rule on whether human genes can be patented, in a case that will shape future research.
abstract: Supreme Court struggles to find narrow ruling on whether human genes may be patented; case involves Utah company Myriad Genetics.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court on Monday struggled to find a narrow way to rule on whether human genes can be patented, in a case that will shape future research.

headline.seo: Justices Mull Patents on Human Genes
headline.main: Justices Seem Wary of Bold Action in Gene Patent Case
headline.print_headline: Court Mulls Patents on Human Genes
